items.sentence: Tom asked Mary to tell John why she did that.
Tom asked Mary to pay his water bill for him.
Tom asked Mary to help him look for his keys.
Tom and Mary are going to walk home together.
Tom and John are on the same basketball team.
Neither Tom nor Mary seemed to be suspicious.
Neither Tom nor Mary really wants to do that.
Neither Tom nor Mary has to be here tomorrow.
Neither Tom nor Mary has signed a confession.
Neither Tom nor Mary has promised to help us.
